com.polytech.di4.HelloAnt

Class AntHill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polytech.di4.HelloAnt.AntGameObject
      • com.polytech.di4.HelloAnt.AntHill

  • public class AntHill
extends AntGameObject
    This class implements the object used to make ants in the game. It has a position (col,row) on the map and can be disabled.
    Author:
    Benjamin
